decisions.decision: Use dependency injection for git module testing
decisions.reason: ESM mocking with Vitest is complex; setExecFn/resetExecFn pattern is simpler and more reliable
React-based, good testing support with ink-testing-library, matches project spec

decisions.decision: Use git log --numstat for stats instead of git diff --stat
decisions.reason: git diff --stat returns empty for clean working tree; numstat correctly sums committed changes
